package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        // 嵌套循环输出九九乘法表
        // \t 水平制表符   \n 换行符
        for(int m = 1; m <= 9; m++) {
            for(int n = 1; n <= m; n++) {
                System.out.print(n + "*" + m + "=" + m*n + "\t");
            }
            System.out.print("\n");
        }
    }
}
